scripts.build: npm run build-example-game && npm run build-example-lottie
scripts.build-example-game: cd wrappings/example-game && npm i && parcel build ./index.html --dist-dir ../../dist/example-game --public-url wwwroot/example-game/ && cd ../..
scripts.build-example-lottie: cd wrappings/example-lottie && npm i && parcel build ./index.html --dist-dir ../../dist/example-lottie --public-url wwwroot/example-lottie/ && cd ../..
